message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and importance to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $11000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a product worth $12000 at a competitive rate, tailored specifically to meet your needs. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exclusive offer.
